REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0126 reute d f BC-<DESIGNS-INC>-TO-MAKE 03-12 0057

TEXT.TITLE: <DESIGNS INC> TO MAKE SHARE OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Designs Inc said it intends to make an initial public offering of common stock in late spring or early summer, depending on market conditions. The company opoerates 27 retil clothing stores under the name "Designs, exclusively Levi Strauss and Co" along the Eastern Seaboard. Reuter
